mapper.select: SELECT relationship_id,(SELECT position_name from position WHERE position.position_id=dp_position.position_id) position_name,(SELECT department from department WHERE dp_position.department_id = department.department_id) department_name , salary from dp_position,department,position WHERE position.position_id=dp_position.position_id and dp_position.department_id = department.department_id
mapper.update: update dp_position,position set dp_position.position_id = #{position_id} ,department_id = #{department_id}, salary=#{salary} WHERE relationship_id=#{relationship_id} and position.position_id = (SELECT position_id FROM (SELECT * FROM dp_position WHERE relationship_id = #{relationship_id}) a)
